p: The MIC and MBC values of the EOs against tested bacterial strains are shown in Table 3. According to the results, both EOs had the lowest MIC and MBC values (0.12 and 0.25 mg mL -1, respectively) against S. aureus. The highest MIC and MBC values of D. moldavica EO were observed against E. coli and S.typhimorium with the same values (MIC: 2.00 mg mL -1, MBC: 4.00 mg mL -1). E. coli was the most resistant bacteria to M. officinalis EO with similar MIC and MBC values (2.00 mg mL -1).
